name: Schizophrenic Rabbit Game
description:
Learn to play music by ear. Downloads the full version.

Play the Schizophrenic Rabbit game every day, this game will help you play by ear.

When someone asks you to play a song for the first time you will have an easier time.
You will learn to play new songs faster and better. 
If you keep practicing this game, you will have an advantage in playing songs.

You can buy the full game if you want to support its development.

Thank you!

⬐ Learn to play music by ear right now ⬎

"Invest in your education and you will get benefits the rest of your life."

Get the latest version, is receiving regular content updates:
